room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Escape Games Worcester in Worcester
room_description: You have found your way into the house of a young starlet and are looking to discover what has caused her mysterious death. As you are sneaking your way through her room, you learn all that glitters is not gold. Dark and startling secrets rise to the surface and you begin to fear for not just your life, but for the livelihood of the entire nation. The clock is ticking. Will you learn the truth behind one of Americaâ€™s greatest conspiracies or lose it all in the process?
